TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Cursors extends System.Object
public ref class Cursors abstract sealed
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Cursors extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供由 Windows 窗体应用程序使用的 对象的集合。

span.span: Provides a collection of objects for use by a Windows Forms application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类中的某些对象可以采用不同于所述外观的外观。Some of the objects in this class can take on a different appearance than those described. 用户可以通过在其操作系统中调整鼠标指针设置来更改光标的外观。The user can change the cursor appearance by adjusting the mouse pointer settings in their operating system. 平移和无移动光标都是静态的，不能由操作系统更改。The panning and no move cursors are static and cannot be changed by the operating system. 在鼠标滚轮操作过程中将使用平移和无移动光标。The panning and no move cursors are used during mouse wheel operations. 根据窗口的滚动方向，当单击鼠标滚轮时，光标将变为适当的 "不移动" 光标。Depending on the direction the window can be scrolled, the cursor changes to the appropriate no move cursor when the mouse wheel is clicked. 当鼠标移动时，光标将更改为相应的平移光标。The cursor then changes to the appropriate panning cursor as the mouse is moved. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性、 类和类更改鼠标光标 。The following example demonstrates changing the mouse cursor using the property, the class, and the class. 该示例创建一个窗体，该窗体包含 控件、 控件和 控件。The example creates a form that contains a control, a control, and a control. 包含由类提供的所有游标 。The contains all cursors provided by the class. 当用户在中选择鼠标光标时 ，属性将 设置为所选的光标，这会更新的光标 。When the user selects a mouse cursor in the , the property is set to the selected cursor, which updates the cursor for the . 每次发生事件时，都会更新 。The is updated every time the event occurs. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursors#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursors/CPP/cursorexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursors#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursors/CS/cursorexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Cursors#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursors/VB/cursorexample.vb#1)] 下面的示例在窗体上以其正常大小绘制指定的光标，在拉伸模式下绘制两倍于其大小。The following example draws the specified cursor on the form in its normal size, and in stretched mode, twice its size. 此示例假设您有一个 和一个对象，该 对象在调用时传递到方法中。This example assumes that you have a and a object to pass into the method when it is called. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CPP/cursorstuff.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CS/cursorstuff.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/VB/cursorstuff.vb#2)]

public: static property System::Windows::Forms::Cursor ^ AppStarting { System::Windows::Forms::Cursor ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取在应用程序启动时显示的光标。

span.span: Gets the cursor that appears when an application starts.

value.span: 一个 ，它表示应用程序启动时显示的光标。

span.span: The that represents the cursor that appears when an application starts.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示 类。The following example demonstrates the class. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中，并从窗体的构造函数或 Load 方法中调用 InitializeRadioButtonsAndGroupBox 方法。To run this example place paste the following code in a form and call the InitializeRadioButtonsAndGroupBox method from the form's constructor or Load method. 确保所有事件都已连接到其事件处理方法。Ensure all events are connected to their event-handling methods. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRadioButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRadioButtonExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRadioButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRadioButtonExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRadioButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRadioButtonExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

value.span: 一个 ，它表示手形光标。

span.span: The that represents the hand cursor.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在派生类中重写方法，并使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a derived class and using the property. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到新的窗体中，并在窗体后粘贴此类，从而形成同一文件。To run the example, paste the following code in a new form and paste this class, forming the same file, after the form. 向窗体添加一个类型为 FunButton 的按钮。Add a button of type FunButton to the form. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ControlDefaultProperties#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ControlDefaultProperties/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ControlDefaultProperties#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ControlDefaultProperties/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ControlDefaultProperties#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ControlDefaultProperties/VB/form1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property WaitCursor As Cursor
public: static property System::Windows::Forms::Cursor ^ WaitCursor { System::Windows::Forms::Cursor ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取等待光标，通常是沙漏形状。

span.span: Gets the wait cursor, typically an hourglass shape.

value.span: 一个 ，它表示等待光标。

span.span: The that represents the wait cursor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要强制在给定控件上显示等待光标，请调用该控件的 方法。To force display of the wait cursor over a given control, call that control's method. 若要为整个应用程序显示等待光标，无论选择哪个控件或窗体，请对 类调用 。To make the wait cursor display for the entire application, regardless of the control or form selected, call on the class.
